project.description: this is my httpd job installation and restarting

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: APP_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: this is my App Appache server

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
sudo echo "########### $APP_NAME Installation on Jenkins server ###########"
sudo echo "########### $AP_NAME unisntall apache server##########"
sudo yum remove -y $APP_NAME sudo yum list httpd sudo echo "####### installation of httpd webserver #########" sudo yum install -y $APP_NAME sudo echo "####### status of httpd webserver #########" sudo service $APP_NAME start sudo echo "####### restart of httpd webserver #########" sudo service $APP_NAME status sudo echo "####### again checking status httpd webserver #########" sudo ps -ef|grep $APP_NAME
